definition: (conjunction used to express contrast with a previous clause) but/then/standard/norm/principle/to imitate/to follow/classifier for written items
individual/this/that/size/classifier for people or objects in general

sentences.english: But, how can I open the grave by myself? I had better consult with Abbess Shih.
sentences.chinese: 我一人如何掘得開墳墓？且和石道姑商量則個。
